* *mode* corresponds to data type. For eg. every element of `vector` type have the same mode


```{r}
mode(1:10)
```
* Typical use of lists - combine dissimilar data returned by a function
`hist()` is a typical example

```{r}
hn <- hist(Nile)
str(hn)
hn$density
class(hn)
str(1:3)
```
